titles.title: We've Come To The Altar Of Incense

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We've come to the altar of incense,
No longer the many but one;
We've come to the evening oblation,
To be offered in the fulness of the Son.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Burn thou fire till Christ be offered up
And we enter into the holiest of all. (x2)
